keyMoments.title: Luffy Attacks Blackbeard with Jet Pistol
keyMoments.description: In the Impel Down flashback, Luffy uses his rubber powers to attack Blackbeard with a Jet Pistol.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's combat abilities even when facing a superior opponent.

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Mentions Ace's Logia Powers
keyMoments.description: Jinbe warns Luffy that Blackbeard was strong enough to defeat Ace despite his Logia-type Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes the danger of Blackbeard's Dark-Dark Fruit, which can nullify other Devil Fruit powers.

abilities.description: Blackbeard uses gravitational force to pull opponents toward him, then slams them into the ground.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Demonstrates Dark-Dark Fruit Powers
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard retaliates against Luffy's attack by activating his Yami Yami no Mi powers, using Kurouzu to pull Luffy toward him and slam him into the ground.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the terrifying power of the Dark-Dark Fruit and explains how it was able to defeat Ace despite his Logia abilities.
